Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • pieces.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, Castle, Horse, King, Pawn, Queen

    public abstract class Piece
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Piece class serves as super class for all game pieces
    Author:
    edurso

    Serialized Form

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<ChessSquare> move(ChessSquare[][] currentBoardState,
                                                      int x,
                                                      int y)
        updates the list of moves the piece can make pre: piece is not null, state must be valid post: list of moves that suit the piece
        Parameters:
        currentBoardState - array of ChessSquares representing the current state of the board
        x - current x position of the piece
        y - current y position of the piece
        Returns:
        the new list of possible moves
